posts.title: How to Start a Blog in 6 Steps
posts.body:
*Pick a blog name. Choose a descriptive name for your blog.
*Get your blog online. Register your blog and get hosting.   
*Customize your blog. Choose a free blog design template and tweak it.  
*Write & publish your first post. ...
*Promote your blog. ...
*Make money blogging.

posts.title: Types Of Blogs
posts.body: Personal blogs. Business/corporate blogs. Personal brand/professional blogs

posts.title: What is Blog
posts.body: blog, in full Web log or Weblog, online journal where an individual, group, or corporation presents a record of activities, thoughts, or beliefs. Some blogs operate mainly as news filters, collecting various online sources and adding short comments and Internet links.
